title: Why does Camille say a lot of her voice lines out loud to everyone?
body: Is this intended  or a bug?

replies.body: It's because old people love talking to everyone.
And making sure their opinions are heard by everyone.
Most of the newer champions tend to talk aloud tbh
What...do you mean? Every champion has voice lines.

> [{quoted}](name=Pinkaj,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JE25dY4K,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-06T02:02:35.901+0000)
>
> What...do you mean? Every champion has voice lines.

I mean that she says voice lines to everyone. Most champions voice lines only play for the person playing the champion or if its their ultimate or something like that.

> [{quoted}](name=Gentleman Yasuo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JE25dY4K,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-01-06T05:23:35.662+0000)
>
> I mean that she says voice lines to everyone. Most champions voice lines only play for the person playing the champion or if its their ultimate or something like that.

Oh I see. I'm actually not sure if it's intended, but I guess it's alright to assume it's alright.
She old yo. She gotta get peoples attention and tell them about her life.
She genuinely just wants to know where you are going?
